  "description": "Detail and Avedia Consulting is a retail and media consulting firm that offers branding, marketing and sales related services to its clients. We are constantly developing models that improve business processes and products across multiple sectors. With our experience in product development and project management, we are able to give our clients an edge. We want to arm them with detailed research and insights to better navigate their current playing field.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Content Developer

Job Location:&nbsp;Jibowu, Yaba - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are seeking a skilled and creative Content Developer with 3&ndash;4 years of proven experience to take ownership of content production from start to finish.
	This role requires someone who can generate ideas, create, edit, and publish content that enhances brand visibility, engages target audiences, and drives business objectives.
	Beyond digital content, the ideal candidate will also be responsible for developing original show concepts, pitching/selling these shows, and managing full production from ideation to execution.


Key Responsibilities


	Plan, create, and manage the end-to-end content production.
	Research industry-related topics and generate innovative content ideas.
	Write, edit, and proofread engaging content e.g., blogs, articles, website copy, social media, newsletters, scripts, etc.
	Develop creative show concepts, pitch/sell them internally and externally, and oversee production from start to finish.
	Collaborate with the media team, and other stakeholders to develop multimedia content.
	Ensure all content aligns with brand voice, tone, and guidelines.
	Optimize content for SEO, audience engagement, and performance.
	Manage the content lifecycle: ideation, development, approvals, publishing, and updates.
	Monitor and report on content performance using analytics tools.
	Repurpose and refresh existing content to maintain relevance.


Requirements &amp; Qualifications


	Bachelor&rsquo;s degree in Communications, English, Marketing, or related field.
	3-4 years of experience as a Content Developer, Content Writer, Copywriter, or similar role.
	Strong writing, editing, and storytelling skills with attention to detail.
	Proven experience in show development, pitching, and production management.
	Ability to manage multiple projects, prioritize tasks and meet deadlines.
	Familiarity with SEO best practices and digital marketing strategies.
	Proficiency in content management systems (e.g., WordPress) and collaboration tools.
	Basic knowledge of graphic design, video editing, or multimedia content creation is an added advantage.
	Strong organizational and project management skills.


Remuneration
N400,000 monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;jobs@detailandavedia.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.",

Content Developer Job at Detail and Avedia Consulting




        
    

        
        Detail and Avedia Consulting is a retail and media consulting firm that offers branding, marketing and sales related services to its clients. We are constantly developing models that improve business processes and products across multiple sectors. With our experience in product development and project management, we are able to give our clients an edge. We want to arm them with detailed research and insights to better navigate their current playing field.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Content Developer

Job Location: Jibowu, Yaba - Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are seeking a skilled and creative Content Developer with 3–4 years of proven experience to take ownership of content production from start to finish.
	This role requires someone who can generate ideas, create, edit, and publish content that enhances brand visibility, engages target audiences, and drives business objectives.
	Beyond digital content, the ideal candidate will also be responsible for developing original show concepts, pitching/selling these shows, and managing full production from ideation to execution.


Key Responsibilities


	Plan, create, and manage the end-to-end content production.
	Research industry-related topics and generate innovative content ideas.
	Write, edit, and proofread engaging content e.g., blogs, articles, website copy, social media, newsletters, scripts, etc.
	Develop creative show concepts, pitch/sell them internally and externally, and oversee production from start to finish.
	Collaborate with the media team, and other stakeholders to develop multimedia content.
	Ensure all content aligns with brand voice, tone, and guidelines.
	Optimize content for SEO, audience engagement, and performance.
	Manage the content lifecycle: ideation, development, approvals, publishing, and updates.
	Monitor and report on content performance using analytics tools.
	Repurpose and refresh existing content to maintain relevance.


Requirements & Qualifications


	Bachelor’s degree in Communications, English, Marketing, or related field.
	3-4 years of experience as a Content Developer, Content Writer, Copywriter, or similar role.
	Strong writing, editing, and storytelling skills with attention to detail.
	Proven experience in show development, pitching, and production management.
	Ability to manage multiple projects, prioritize tasks and meet deadlines.
	Familiarity with SEO best practices and digital marketing strategies.
	Proficiency in content management systems (e.g., WordPress) and collaboration tools.
	Basic knowledge of graphic design, video editing, or multimedia content creation is an added advantage.
	Strong organizational and project management skills.


Remuneration
N400,000 monthly.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: jobs@detailandavedia.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Head of School Job at Lovereigns Heritage Foundation




        
    

        
        Lovereigns Heritage Foundation is aNGO keenly focused on combating poverty and illiteracy and also promoting good health for all people. We are focused on enhancing a stable economic state by promoting women’s empowerment through entrepreneurship training, eradicating illiteracy in our society by providing educational opportunities for children from impoverished homes and the vulnerable as well as increase their access to learning thereby developing and strengthening their cognitive skills to better equip them for self-sustenance and also improving the wellbeing of those in our communities through medical mission.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Head of School
     

            
    



Job Location: Abeokuta, Ogun
Employment Type: Full-time

Summary


	Are you a dynamic school leader with a heart for impact and a vision for educational excellence? We are seeking an experienced Head of School to drive the development of a purpose-driven learning environment built on compassion, innovation, and academic excellence.


Minimum Requirements


	A minimum of a Bachelor’s degree in Education (B.Ed) or a relevant Bachelor’s degree (e.g., B.Sc/B.A) with a Postgraduate Diploma in Education (PGDE)
	At least 3 - 6 years of progressive leadership experience in a reputable nursery and primary school setting
	In-depth knowledge and practical experience withrelevant aspects of the Nigerian education system(In-depth knowledge of British EYFS and Key Stages 1 & 2 curriculum is an added advantage)
	Demonstrated ability to manage academic and administrative operations effectively
	Excellent communication, organizational, and interpersonal skills
	Proven experience in staff supervision, performance management, and school improvement initiatives
	Must currently reside in or be willing to relocate to Abeokuta.


Who we are looking for


	A visionary educator with a strong track record ofleadership of 4-6 yearsin early years and primary education, ideally within a Nigerian-British curriculum framework
	Demonstrated expertise in curriculum development, academic planning, and assessment practices across EYFS and Key Stages 1 & 2
	Strong understanding of child-centered pedagogy, safeguarding, and inclusive education practices
	Exceptional leadership and team management skills, with the ability to inspire, mentor, and develop teachers and non-teaching staff
	Proficient in school administration, policy implementation, and regulatory compliance (including Nigerian Ministry of Education and international best practices)
	Tech-savvy, with a commitment to integrating digital tools to enhance teaching, learning, and school operations
	A confident communicator with excellent interpersonal skills for engaging with students, parents, staff, and the wider school community
	Passionate about holistic education - academic excellence, character development, and nurturing confident, well-rounded global citizens
	Proven ability to build a positive, respectful, and achievement-oriented school culture.


Method of Application 
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and a brief Cover Letter to: citispeedheritage@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Civil Engineer Job at Joe Etoniru & Associates




        
    

        
        Joe Etoniru & Associates - Our client in the Real Estate and Construction sector is recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Civil Engineer

Job Location: Lagos 
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

            
    




	Our client is seeking to hire an experienced, driven civil engineer with a wealth of industry knowledge. To ensure success, the ideal candidate should be comfortable splitting their hours between the office, on-site visits, and attending council meetings.
	The civil engineer should be a critical thinker and have sound subject knowledge of mathematics and physics to identify and solve engineering problems.
	You must also possess a certain level of creativity in order to present innovative solutions and improvements to technical processes.
	The successful candidate will be able to effectively communicate ideas, make recommendations, and negotiate project details with their team, subcontractors, and clients.


Responsibilities:


	Developing detailed designs.
	Doing feasibility assessments and site inspections.
	Preparing and implementing project plans.
	Researching and providing estimates for projects.
	Reviewing government regulations and ordinances.
	Monitoring and optimizing safety procedures, production processes, and regulatory compliance.
	Making recommendations or presenting alternative solutions to problems.
	Confidently liaising with clients and other professional subcontractors.
	Project management duties (e.g. managing budgets, resources, and deadlines; acquiring and compiling quotes, etc.).


Requirements


	Bachelor’s Degree in Civil Engineering or related field, accredited by the Institution of Civil Engineers.
	Registration/Licensure as a professional engineer may be required.
	A minimum of 3 years of industry knowledge may be strongly desired.
	Familiarity with design software, such as Autodesk, AutoCAD Civil 3D, and MicroStation.
	Knowledge of map creation software and photo imaging software.
	Strong analytical and critical thinking skills, with a high level of accuracy in calculations and design.
	Excellent time management skills to ensure project deadlines are met.
	Leadership skills to effectively manage a diverse group of professionals working on one project.
	Ability to coordinate more than one project at a time.


Compensation and Benefits
We offer a competitive salary and benefits package, including commission-based earnings, health insurance.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their resume and a cover letter outlining your qualifications and interest in the position  to: recruitment.bluebirdng@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.
